It is typically served chilled and garnished with crumbled queso fresco cheese. It's traditionally prepared by mashing the ingredients in a molcajete, resulting in a chunky, vibrant green mixture with visible bits of vegetables and a slightly glossy texture.	<>	Guacamole is a creamy, vibrant green dip made from mashed avocados, onions, tomatoes, and cilantro, often seasoned with lime juice, salt, and chili powder, and typically served fresh and chunky with tortilla chips.

It's traditionally hand-mixed in a molcajete, giving it a chunky texture and vibrant green color.
